name: Free Online PDF Split & Page Extractor - ATools
description: Split PDFs or extract selected pages locally in your browser, exporting PDF or ZIP (no uploads).
seoDescription: Free online PDF split & page extractor by ATools. Import a PDF and extract selected pages by range (e.g., 1-3,5,10-) into a new PDF, or export each selected page as an individual PDF bundled in a ZIP. Runs entirely in your browser with zero uploads for privacy.
